title: Bulk Event
description: Events for different consignments, pickup-orders, packages or tours, which occurred during the processing. The events can be send in bulk.

$createdAt.title: Created at date
$createdAt.description: The message was created at date

receiver.title: Routing information of the message
receiver.description: Routing information to identify the parties involved in the data transfer

partnerId.title: The PartnerId
partnerId.description: The partner which is sending the message to the receiving partner for further actions (e.g. 1234)

ediId.title: The Edi Id
ediId.description: The Edi Id is the technical sender or receiver (e.g. CONIZVK)

coniziId.title: The Conizi Id
coniziId.description: The conizi id for internal routing purposes

network.title: Network
network.description: The network under which rules the consignment should be processed

networkId.title: Name of the network
networkId.description: The name of the network. This is often identical to the name of the code list. Since the same code list may however be used outside the network, this field independently allows to specify the network

codelist.title: Name of the code list used
codelist.description: The name of the code list which specifies how the receiving system should interpret the codes used

product.title: Name of the product
product.description: The product allows to distingish different processes within one network, effectively sub classing the network

items.title: Consignment event
items.description: An event which occurred during the processing of the referenced consignment

$createdAt.title: Created at date
$createdAt.description: The message was created at date

consignmentNoShippingPartner.title: Consignment number of the shipping partner
consignmentNoShippingPartner.description: Unique identification for the consignment within the transport management system of the shipping partner

consignmentNoReceivingPartner.title: Consignment number of the receiving partner
consignmentNoReceivingPartner.description: Unique identification for the consignment within the transport management system of the receiving partner

consignmentNoDeliveringPartner.title: Consignment number of the delivering partner
consignmentNoDeliveringPartner.description: Unique identification for the consignment within the transport management system of the delivering partner

shippingPartner.title: Fields to identify the partner
shippingPartner.description: Routing information to identify the parties involved in the data transfer

geoPosition.title: Geo position
geoPosition.description: Data about the current geo position

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: East–west position of a point on the Earth's surface

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: North–south position of a point on the Earth's surface

placeName.title: Place name
placeName.description: The place name of the current geo position

w3WCoordinate.title: What3words coordinate
w3WCoordinate.description: A coordinate for the What3Words service like index.home.raft

recordTime.title: Record time
recordTime.description: Time the GPS record was created

countryCode.title: Country code of the address Use ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 codes.

additionalAddressLines.title: Additional address lines of the address

partnerId.title: The PartnerId
partnerId.description: The partner which is sending the message to the receiving partner for further actions (e.g. 1234)

ediId.title: The Edi Id
ediId.description: The Edi Id is the technical sender or receiver (e.g. CONIZVK)

coniziId.title: The Conizi Id
coniziId.description: The conizi id for internal routing purposes

countryCode.title: Country code of the address Use ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 codes.

additionalAddressLines.title: Additional address lines of the address

dataProcessing.title: Data processing
dataProcessing.description: Events occurred while validating and processing the data

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

invalidData.title: Empty Extendable Object
invalidData.description: The empty EmptyExtendableObject is used for non yet completed defined objects.

generalProcessingNotification.title: General processing
generalProcessingNotification.description: Events occurred while physically processing the pickup order (e.g. moving goods, scanning packages)

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occurred while processing the consignment/pickup.Use (null) to report successful processing of the consignment/pickup

signingInformation.title: Signing Information
signingInformation.description: Transmission of the receipt, the delivery date and the delivery time

unloading.title: Unloading
unloading.description: Events occurred while unloading the consignment

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occurred while processing the consignment.Use (null) to report successful processing of the consignment

gateway.title: Gateway-Options
gateway.description: Special requirements for the handling of the goods at intermediate hubs / gateways

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: The consignment must be processed with priority

deliveryPlanning.title: Delivery planning
deliveryPlanning.description: Events occurred while planning the delivery of the consignment

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occurred while planning the delivery of the consignment.Use (null) to report successful processing of the consignment

notification.title: Notification
notification.description: Events occurred while processing the notification of the consignment

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

trigger.title: Trigger
trigger.description: Event that is a trigger for starting a notification

automatic.title: Automatic
automatic.description: Start an automatic notification (i.e. automatic notification system via email or SMS)

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occurred while processing the notification of the consignment.Use (null) to report successful notifcations of the consignment

deliveryStarted.title: Delivery started
deliveryStarted.description: Events indicating the start of the delivery

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

tourNumber.title: Tour number
tourNumber.description: Number of the planned / assigned local traffic tour for delivery

exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occurred while starting the delivery of the consignment.Use (null) to report successful starting of the consignment delivery

estimatedArrivalAtReceiver.title: Estimated time of arrival at receiver
estimatedArrivalAtReceiver.description: Events occurred regarding the estimated time of arrival at receiver

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

estimatedArrivalTime.title: Estimated arrival date/time
estimatedArrivalTime.description: Date and time of the estimated arrival

arrivalAtReceiver.title: Arrival at receiver
arrivalAtReceiver.description: Events occurred while arriving the receiver

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

deliveryAttemptFailed.title: Delivery attempt failed
deliveryAttemptFailed.description: Events indicating a failed delivery attempt

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

returnConsignmentNo.title: Return consignment no
returnConsignmentNo.description: Number of the consignment which is used to return the goods to the shipper

signee.title: Signee
signee.description: Name of the person which rejected the consignment

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that caused the delivery to be fail

rejected.title: Rejected
rejected.description: The consignee has rejected the consignment

difficulties.title: Difficulties
difficulties.description: There were difficulties delivering the goods

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occurred when consignment was successfully delivered.Use (null) to report successful processing of the consignment

signee.title: Signee
signee.description: Name of the person which rejected the consignment

completion.title: Work completed - forwarded
completion.description: Events indicating successful completion of a task, consignment has been forwarded

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

signee.title: Signee
signee.description: Name of the person which rejected the consignment

changeRequest.title: Change request
changeRequest.description: A new delivery term that should be considered for billing

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

billingDeliveryTerm.title: Billing - Delivery term
billingDeliveryTerm.description: A new delivery term that should be considered for billing

billingAreaPalletBays.title: Billing - Area (in pallet bays)
billingAreaPalletBays.description: The area occupied by the consignment - expressed in standard pallet sizes

billingLoadingMeter.title: Billing - Loading meter
billingLoadingMeter.description: The area occupied by the consignment - expressed in loading meters

items.title: Pickup order event
items.description: An event which occurred during the processing of the referenced pickup order

$createdAt.title: Created at date
$createdAt.description: The message was created at date

pickupOrderNo.title: Pickup order number of the contract partner
pickupOrderNo.description: Unique identification for the pickup order within the transport management system of the contract partner

pickupOrderDate.title: Pickup order date
pickupOrderDate.description: The date on which the pickup order was forwarded to the contracted partner

pickupPlanning.title: Pickup planning
pickupPlanning.description: Events occurred while planning a pickup order

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while planning the pickup.Use(null) to report successful planning of the pickup

pickupStarted.title: Pickup started
pickupStarted.description: Events occurred while starting a pickup order

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while starting the pickup.Use (null) to report successful starting of the pickup

pickupArrival.description: Events occurred while arrival a pickup location

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while arrival at the pickup location.Use (null) to report successful arrival

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while the pickup finished at shipper.Use (null) to report successful arrival

pickupLoadingStarted.title: Pickup loading started
pickupLoadingStarted.description: Events occurred while pickup loading started

eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while starting the loading process.Use (null) to report successful starting the loading process

pickupLoadingCompleted.title: Pickup loading completed
pickupLoadingCompleted.description: Events occurred while pickup loading completed

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while completing the loading process.Use (null) to report successful completion of the loading process

pickupAttemptFailed.title: Pickup attempt failed
pickupAttemptFailed.description: Events indicating a failed pickup attempt

eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that caused the pickup to be fail

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while pickup the pickup order.Use (null) to report successful pickup

unloading.title: Unloading
unloading.description: Events occured while unloading the pickup order at the plant of the shipping partner

eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while unloading the pickup order.Use (null) to report successful unloading the pickup order

eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

cancellation.title: Cancellation

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

items.title: Package event
items.description: An event which occurred during the processing of the referenced package.

$createdAt.title: Created at date
$createdAt.description: The message was created at date

consignmentNoShippingPartner.title: Consignment number of the shipping partner
consignmentNoShippingPartner.description: Unique identification for the consignment within the transport management system of the shipping partner

packageNo.title: Package number / Barcode of the package
packageNo.description: Unique identification for the package. This is often an SSCC / NVE barcode number

pickupSender.title: Package specific Event
pickupSender.description: Event to notify about package specific incidents

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

packageType.title: Type of the package
packageType.description: Type of the package that is beeing reported

bulkiness.title: Bulkiness of the package
bulkiness.description: Bulkiness of the package (length / width / height)

exceptions.title: Exceptions
exceptions.description: Detailed information about the exceptions that occured while processing / scanning the package

items.title: Tour event
items.description: An event which occurred during the processing of the referenced tour

$createdAt.title: Created at date
$createdAt.description: The message was created at date

tourId.title: Referenced Tour Id
tourId.description: A unique identifier assigned to this tour by the devlivering company

tour.title: Tour specific Event
tour.description: Event to notify about tour specific incidents

eventDateTime.title: Event Date-time
eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

tourScheduled.title: Tour scheduled
tourScheduled.description: Disposal of a tour was done

tourTransmitted.title: Tour transmitted
tourTransmitted.description: The tour was transmitted to the mobile device

tourAccepted.title: Tour accepted

tourRejected.title: Tour rejected

tourStarted.description: The tour was started by the driver

tourCompleted.title: Tour completed
tourCompleted.description: The tour was completed by the driver

tourPaused.title: Tour paused
tourPaused.description: The tour was paused by the driver

tourResumed.title: Tour resumed
tourResumed.description: The tour was resumed by the driver

workingTimeStarted.title: Working Time Started
workingTimeStarted.description: Working time has been started for the driver

workingTimeCompleted.title: Working Time Completed
workingTimeCompleted.description: Working time has been ended for the driver

cleaningStarted.title: Cleaning Started
cleaningStarted.description: Cleaning of the vehicle has been started

cleaningCompleted.title: Cleaning Completed

trailerExchangeStarted.title: Trailer Exchange Started

waitingTimeCompleted.title: Waiting Time Completed
waitingTimeCompleted.description: Waiting time for next action completed

eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred

departure.title: Departure

eventDateTime.description: Date and time when the event occurred
